revision.text: Possibly: An Enquiry into the History of Scotland preceding the reign of Malcom III. or the year 1056. Including the Authentic History of that Period. In Two Volumes. By John Pinkerton. (London : Printed by John Nichols, For George Nicol, Bookseller to His Majesty, Pall-Mall; and John Bell, Edinburgh, M.DCC.LXXXIX.
